title: “We are a higher court, but not a better one”: Kagan rages at SCOTUS decision to allow Texas maps
description: The justice lambasted the court's conservatives for allowing redrawn Texas congressional maps to take effect
content: The Supreme Court gave Texas the go-ahead to use Republican-favoring maps in the 2026 midterms on Thursday, staying a lower court’s ruling that the maps were likely the result of an unconstitutional … [+2372 chars]
